scripts.dev:t2i: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server -- configs/flux2-text-to-image.json" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:i2v: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server -- configs/wan2-i2v.json" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:edit: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server -- configs/flux2-image-edit.json" "npm run client"
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
